mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(tdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd') tdate, t.tno, gname, TO_CHAR((price * quantity), 'FM999,999,999,999') sum, quantity, NVL(cnt, 0) cnt FROM transaction t, goods g, member m, ( SELECT count(*) cnt, t.tno FROM transaction t, review r WHERE t.tno = r.tno group by t.tno ) tt WHERE t.gno = g.gno AND t.mno = m.mno AND t.tno = tt.tno(+) AND id = #{id} order by tdate desc
SELECT g.gname name, g.gno gno FROM (select tno stno from transaction where tno = #{tno}) s, TRANSACTION t, goods g WHERE g.gno = t.gno and (upno like stno or tno like stno)
mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(qno) + 1, 100001) FROM qna

, upqno ) VALUES (#{qno}, #{title}, #{body}, (SELECT gno FROM goods WHERE gname = #{name}), (SELECT mno FROM member WHERE id = #{id})
